snippet: Narayana Kocherlakota, a defender of an accommodative policy, plans to step down as president of the Federal Reserve Bank of Minneapolis when his term ends.
abstract: Narayana Kocherlakota says that he will step down as president of Federal Reserve Bank of Minneapolis at end of his term in 2016; Kocherlakota will become third Fed dissenter in 2014 to announce plans to leave central bank.
lead_paragraph: Narayana Kocherlakota, a defender of an accommodative policy, plans to step down as president of the Federal Reserve Bank of Minneapolis when his term ends.

headline.main: Minneapolis Fed Chief to Step Down in 2016
headline.print_headline: Minneapolis Fed Chief to Step Down in 2016
